articles.author: Matt Young
articles.title: Russian Ambassador: 'Odious' Lindsey Graham Risks Nuclear War Over a Drone - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Even Tucker Carlson hit out at the South Carolina senator, who suggested the American military should down Russian jets if they get too close to U.S. aircraft.
articles.content: Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-SC) was copping it from all sides Wednesday night annoying both Russia and Tucker Carlsonafter the Republican suggested that the U.S. should shoot down Russian planes if they e… [+4724 chars]
